ISSUE.TITLE: flowable-idm fails to start: relation "act_id_user" does not exist
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Using Tomcat 8 with PostgreSQL configured using JNDI data source. When deploying the four UI apps (task,admin,modeler,idm) on Tomcat 8, having created the database beforehand with the distributed database scripts, the first three apps start fine but the IDM fails with a PersistenceException: `### Error querying database. Cause: org.postgresql.util.PSQLException: ERROR: relation "act_id_user" does not exist` See attached catalina.out [catalina.out.txt](https://github.com/flowable/flowable-engine/files/914656/catalina.out.txt)
